summary: This document is a deferred prosecution application filed by the law firm Foy & Seplowitz LLC on behalf of defendant Tova Noel. It appears to be a legal filing in the Southern District of New York related to criminal case 19 Cr. 830 (AT).

persons.context: Named as the defendant in criminal case 19 Cr. 830 (AT) in the Southern District of New York, with attorneys from Foy & Seplowitz LLC representing her.
